target: I will book that for you now.
context: <user> Can you help me find somewhere to stay with free wifi? <system> Sure, most places offer that these days. Do you have an area of town you would like to stay in? <user> We need the hotel to be in the north. <system> Okay and what is your price range? <user> Price range doesn't matter to me. I'd like it to have a one star. <system> I'm so sorry, but we don't have a one star in that area. Would you like for me to check a different area? <user> How about a 4 star rating? <system> The acorn guest house is a 4 star guesthouse with wifi. Would you like to make a reservation?<user> sure, i need it for 3 nights starting wednesday. <system> Before I book how many people will be staying with you?<user> Please book the hotel for 5 people. <system> Booking was successful. Reference number is : YYXR9VMX<user> Thanks. I also need a restaurant in the same area. <system> There are several restaurants, what type of food and price range?<user> Indian food would be great. <system> Okay, what is your price range? We have one in the moderate and one in the cheap range.<user> Can you please make a reservation at the moderately priced one? <system> The Nirala serves Indian cuisine at a moderate price, and is located in the north. How many in your party? What time would you like the table reserved?<user> Ok great, can you book a table for 5 at 14:00 on Wednesday. <system>
